thread.title: Virgin Limited Edition launches agent window dressing competition
thread.title_full: Virgin Limited Edition launches agent window dressing competition

title: Virgin Limited Edition launches agent window dressing competition
text:
Virgin Limited Edition launches agent window dressing competition 7 July 2015 Save 
Travel agents can win a luxury three-night safari for having the best-dressed shop window courtesy of Virgin Limited Edition. 
The competition, repeated from last year, is open to agencies in and around the UK which are being invited to dress up their windows using the operator’s window dressing pack. 
They must then send in pictures of their windows by October 5 in time for judging undertaken by Alexander Wells-Greco, head of visual merchandising at Harrods. 
The prize is a three-night stay at Virgin Limited Edition’s Mahali Mzuri safari camp for two, including all meals and drinks, twice daily game drives and transfers but not flights. 
Wells-Greco said: “I’m very excited to be judging the competition this year and think it’s a fantastic way for the travel trade to unleash their creative sides. 
“I’m pretty sure I’m going to have a challenge on my hands when deciding the winner!” 
In order to enter the competition, agents simply need to contact katherine.beach@virginlimitededition.com for the window dressing pack and more information.
